cause.description:
Help influence the United States Government and the UN Security Council as well as other members of the international community to help free Gilad Schalit still held captive by Hamas, which is an extreme islamic terrorist organization. "ושבו בנים לגבולם"
מי ייתן ויחזור גלעד שליט במהרה לביתו ולמשפחתו האוהבים והנעימים.
receive proof that the abducted IDF soldier Gilad Schalit is alive and well, and to assure his immediate return :
http://habanim.org/en/index_en.html
1. Gilad was captured by Palestinian militants on June 25th, 2006 and has been held hostage by Hamas ever since.
2. Hamas is listed as a terrorist organization by Canada, the European Union, Israel, Japan, and the United States.
cause.mission: To Assure the immediate return of the abducted soldier Gilad Schalit. ----> http://habanim.org/en/index_en.html Edit
cause.name: And Thy Sons Shall Return To Their Borders "ושבו בנים לגבולם"
